CustomField.description: If this Product is related to a Payment Gateway such as Stripe, set the lookup here. If the Product is created with a Gateway in Test Mode, the Product will only be accessible when testing, and vice versa for Live Mode.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this Product is related to a Payment Gateway such as Stripe, set the lookup here. If the Product is created with a Gateway in Test Mode, the Product will only be accessible when testing, and vice versa for Live Mode.
CustomField.label: Payment Gateway
